Subject: MCC guards 
Date: Wed, 30 Jun 2021 15:32:23 +0000 
Hi, 
Two things: 
1. The guards that Noel named as not doing rounds/counts and pre-filling were COs 
2. According to the notes of his interview with us, said he knew but did not tell anyone thatMwas 
released or Epstein was without a  cellmate. He also stated that he was waiting for the c â€¢ warden to put aw
someone new in the cell. In a recent interview with OIG, he says that he didn't know ths as gone and 
denies his prior statement. Do you have a  recollection of this interview? If so, ants to know if we think the 
notes/MOI are correct. 
Assistant United States Attorney
